mapper.select: select c.cart_id, c.item_id, c.quantity, c.size_id, c.updated_at, isz.size, i.item_name,isz.price FROM cart_item c LEFT JOIN inventory_sizes isz on isz.size_id = c.size_id LEFT JOIN inventory i on i.item_id = c.item_id WHERE user_id = #{id} AND status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY c.updated_at DESC
